Question: This person was baptised as a Catholic just before his second birthday, on 21 July 1771 at Ajaccio Cathedral.
Hints: With a small cadre of followers, this person dictated his memoirs and criticised his captors—particularly Lowe.
This person once told his brother Lucien in April 1801, "Skillful conquerors have not got entangled with priests.
The movement toward national unification in Italy was similarly precipitated by this personic rule.
